Class Tour

java.lang.Object
  Tour
All Implemented Interfaces:
TourInterface
public class Tour
extends Object
implements TourInterface

This class is a specialized Linked List of Points that represents a Tour of locations attempting to solve the Travelling Salesperson Problem
